I would use natural cleaning methods such as using baking soda and vinegar to clean my home.
I would wash my hands frequently with water and lemon juice instead of soap.
I would use a UV light to kill germs on surfaces instead of using soap and water.
I would use essential oils to clean my home and my body, as they have natural antibacterial properties.
I would use a solar still to distill water from plants and other natural sources, which would be used for cleaning purposes.
